title: Air waybills (AWB) - IATA standard
dataVerified: Shipper, consignee, airline, flight details, cargo description, value
dataVisibleAfterVerification: AWB status (issued/delivered). Link to airline/freight forwarder system (parties and customs, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered cargo details. Domain binding verifies airline/freight forwarder. IATA compliance. High-value cargo ($10K-$10M+ typical). Customs clearance documentation. Multi-page: AWB multi-page with packing details.
